params._feeToken: payment can be done in any whitelisted token
params._gelatoFee: Fee to be charged, denominated in feeToken

params._sponsorSignature: EIP-712 compliant signature from _req.sponsor                          (can be same as _userSignature)

devdoc.title: Gelato Meta Box contract

forwardCallSyncFee(address,bytes,address.notice: Relay request + Sync Payment (target pays Gelato during call forward)

forwardRequestGasTankFee((uint256,addres.notice: Relay request + async Gas Tank payment deductions (off-chain accounting)Oracle value for exchange rate between native tokens and fee token

metaTxRequestGasTankFee((uint256,address.notice: Relay request + async Gas Tank payment deductions (off-chain accounting)EOA that originates the tx, but does not necessarily pay the relayer

userdoc.notice: This contract must NEVER hold funds!
